input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Artificial Full Black Christmas Tree Holiday Decoration w Branch Tips'
  - Name='National Tree Company Jersey Fraser Fir Tree'
  - Name='Puleo 9ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6 ft. Green Unlit Artificial Classic Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Costway 8ft Snow Flocked Hinged Christmas Tree with Berries and Poinsettia Flowers'
  - Name='National Tree Company Oakley Hills Snow Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Blue Fir Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill Tall Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 3 ft. Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Tangkula 4.5FT Slim Snow-Flocked Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='CC Christmas Decor Pencil Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Stand'
  - Name='Gki/bethlehem Lighting Northlight Pre-Lit Extend-A-Tree Adjustable Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 3 ft. Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Haute Decor 36 Inch Unlit Flocked Stockhorn Potted Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Kincaid Spruce Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights'
  - Name='WELLFOR 7-Feet Artificial Christmas Tree CM-HWY-20655'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7-ft Douglas fir Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T1892'
  - Name='Best Choice Products 4.5ft Premium Unlit Hinged Design Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Artificial Douglas Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International Bulk 6 Pack 4.5Ft Pre-Lit Northern Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a slim artificial Christmas tree with a different model name and brand, likely similar use but different shape and possibly fewer branches compared to the full Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This appears to be the exact or very closely matching product to the reference, sharing brand, product line, and type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Artificial Full Black Christmas Tree Holiday Decoration w Branch Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It is a full artificial Christmas tree with branch tips but differs in color (black) and possibly design; otherwise similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Jersey Fraser Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another fir tree from the same brand, likely similar features but a different fir variety.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo 9ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pre-lit artificial tree but taller and from a different brand; similar function but different dimensions and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Green Unlit Artificial Classic Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height (6 ft), unlit, classic artificial tree matching size and unlit feature, likely similar shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 8ft Snow Flocked Hinged Christmas Tree with Berries and Poinsettia Flowers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An 8 ft hinged artificial tree with extra decorative elements; differs in height, appearance, and decoration complexity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Oakley Hills Snow Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree from same brand but different name and likely appearance/features; similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Blue Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Dunhill Fir designation but in 'Blue Fir' variation; closely related but possibly different needle type or color variation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill Tall Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree but from a different brand and described as tall, likely differing in size and design details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 3 ft. Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same model range but smaller size and different lighting method; similar construction but distinct size and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tangkula 4.5FT Slim Snow-Flocked Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim and snow-flocked artificial tree; significantly different silhouette and styling from full Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pencil fir is a slim, narrow tree unlike the full-bodied Dunhill Fir; unlit but different silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CC Christmas Decor Pencil Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pencil slim fir design, narrower silhouette and different brand; similar function but different form.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gki/bethlehem Lighting Northlight Pre-Lit Extend-A-Tree Adjustable Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit adjustable tree with extendable features; similar use but different brand and design emphasis.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 3 ft. Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller size (3 ft) and different brand; less similar due to scale and possible silhouette differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 36 Inch Unlit Flocked Stockhorn Potted Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller (36 in) potted and flocked tree, different style and intended use compared to full Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Kincaid Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial spruce tree from the same brand; similar function but different tree species and possibly shape.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim Fraser fir tree with lights, same brand but different model and slimmer profile.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: 4.5 ft unlit hinged artificial tree similar in construction to the Dunhill Fir, but smaller and different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Artificial Douglas Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Douglas Fir tree, same species category, similar function but different brand and unknown size.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: 4.5 ft pre-lit Northern Fir tree in bulk pack from different brand; smaller size and packaging differs from single Dunhill Fir.
